page.title: 14Education(contd)
page.content: St Brides is primarily a Catholic school the nursery contains children of mixed religions. The third primary school is Cowdenbeath Primary. Although it has no nursery it is, with 352 pupils divided into 13 classes, the largest of the 3. The school will accept both physically and mentally handicapped children, but if it is seen that no progress is made they will be moved to special facilities elsewhere. The only secondary school in the area is Beath High School. It takes first and second year pupils before they move to the senior building. There are 720 pupils in 24 classes - 12 first year and 12 second year classes. All the classes are mixed ability. All the schools use computers and feel that it is a great help/
